name: Death Witch - GDTV Game Jam
description:
The Shiny Knights have fooled everyone, but not your Coven, and you've thwarted their nefarious plans previously. 

In retribution, they have successfully kidnapped your mother, Hilda. You've learned of a secret entrance to their castle, through some old caves. You'll get Hilda back, with the help of your enemies corpses...

In this 2D Platformer, you play as a witch saving her mother from the evil knights. You use your magic to fight the knights guarding the castle and its secret entrance, and then animate their skeletons to do your bidding.

This game was created for the 2022 GameDev.TV 10 Day Game Jam.

All art used, that wasn't created by the team, can be found here:

Fonts https://www.dafont.com/04b-30.font Sprites https://opengameart.org/content/skeleton-sprite https://opengameart.org/content/free-graveyard-platformer-tileset https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-art-castle-tileset https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-art-femur Sounds https://opengameart.org/node/16327 https://freesound.org/people/hisoul/sounds/520274/ https://freesound.org/people/GreatNate98/sounds/355052/ https://freesound.org/people/mrh4hn/sounds/426627/ https://freesound.org/people/Worldmaxter/sounds/471147/
